featured.text: Pus will build up in the center of the stye, causing a yellowish spot.

definition.zh_def: 膿，通常是由感染引起的液體，含有死去的白血球、細菌和組織碎片。
definition.en_def: A thick fluid produced in infected tissue, consisting of dead white blood cells, bacteria, and tissue debris.
definition.example: The doctor drained the pus from the infected wound.
